meta.title: Google Prompt Framework RSTI
meta.description: Detailed instructions on the RSTI framework for prompt engineering.

items.title: Role
items.text: Role: Clearly define who or what the assistant is supposed to be. Example: 'You are a friendly math tutor.'

items.title: Scenario
items.text: Scenario: Provide the situation or context. Example: 'Helping a student prepare for algebra exams.'

items.title: Task
items.text: Task: Specify the task you want completed. Example: 'Create 5 practice problems with solutions.'

items.title: Instructions
items.text: Instructions: Give any formatting or style constraints. Example: 'Present in JSON format, concise explanations.'
